verses.name: Psalms 105:14
verses.text: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes;

verses.name: Psalms 105:15
verses.text: Saying, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.

verses.name: Psalms 105:16
verses.text: Moreover he called for a famine upon the land: he brake the whole staff of bread.

verses.name: Psalms 105:17
verses.text: He sent a man before them, even Joseph, who was sold for a servant:

verses.name: Psalms 105:18
verses.text: Whose feet they hurt with fetters: he was laid in iron:

verses.name: Psalms 105:19
verses.text: Until the time that his word came: the word of the Lord tried him.

verses.name: Psalms 105:20
verses.text: The king sent and loosed him; even the ruler of the people, and let him go free.
